title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description:
1. Gather and document the requirements for the AIRealEstateAnalyzer tool, including the desired features (e.g., trend analysis, property value prediction), data sources (real estate market data, historical sales data, economic indicators), expected outputs (visualizations, reports), target users (real estate agents, investors, home buyers), performance requirements (processing speed, accuracy), security considerations (data privacy, protection against threats), and any other relevant constraints or assumptions. 

2. Prepare a comprehensive document detailing the project scope and requirements for review by team members and potential stakeholders.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the data pipeline, machine learning models, and user interfaces.

title: Set up Development Environment
description: Set up the development environment, including version control, continuous integration, and deployment tools.

title: Implement Data Ingestion Pipeline
description: Develop the data ingestion pipeline to collect and preprocess real estate data from various sources.

title: Develop Machine Learning Models
description: Implement and train machine learning models to analyze real estate trends and predict property value fluctuations.

title: Build User Interfaces
description: Develop user interfaces for data visualization, model training, and property value prediction.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the system is secure by implementing appropriate security measures, such as data encryption, access controls, and vulnerability testing.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute test plans to ensure the system meets the defined requirements and functions as expected.

title: Deploy and Monitor the System
description: Deploy the AIRealEstateAnalyzer tool to a production environment and set up monitoring and logging systems.

title: Write Documentation
description: Develop comprehensive documentation for the system, including user guides, technical documentation, and maintenance procedures.
